meanings.definition: A batter-based or dough-based cake cooked in a waffle iron.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed eating fluffy waffles for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: Mom made delicious waffles with syrup for brunch.
meanings.sent3: The waffles on my plate looked like little square smiles.
meanings.sent4: Her waffle recipe was a golden ticket to happiness.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly made waffles filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To speak or write at length in a vague or trivial manner.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, he waffles on about unrelated topics.
meanings.sent2: She tends to waffle when asked direct questions.
meanings.sent3: His tendency to waffle in emails often confuses recipients.
meanings.sent4: The politician continued to waffle without addressing the main issue.
meanings.sent5: When nervous, she would waffle endlessly without making a point.
